text: Christopher Jhen-hoong Chung (; born 20 June 1998) is an Australian-born Hong Kong professional footballer who currently plays for Hong Kong Premier League club Pegasus. ==Career== On 17 October 2020, it was revealed that Pegasus had signed Chung. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="2"|Southern |2018–19 |rowspan="2"|Hong Kong Premier League |1||0||0||0||4Appearances in the Hong Kong Sapling Cup||0||0||0||0||0||5||0 |- |2019–20 |2||0||0||0||9Appearances in the Hong Kong Sapling Cup||0||0||0||0||0||11||0 |- ! colspan=3 | Career total !3!!0!!0!!0!!13!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!16!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Australian footballers Category:Hong Kong footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Hong Kong Premier League players Category:Southern District FC players Category:Hong Kong Pegasus FC players Category:Hong Kong people of Australian descent
title: Christopher Chung (footballer)
